warningMessage: The management of PT. Kontakperkasa Futures urges the public to be more cautious of various forms of investment fraud using electronic or social media platforms. Therefore, it is crucial to ensure that funds transferred to the designated account (Segregated Account) for Futures Trading transactions are in the name of PT Kontakperkasa Futures, not an individual.
address: Sudirman Plaza, Plaza Marein Building 7th & 19th Floor, Jl. Jend. Sudirman Kav. 76-78, Jakarta 12910, Indonesia
komdigiDesc: Registered and supervised by the Ministry of Communication and Information Technology of the Republic of Indonesia
